content: 13 decrease in the final 2 sts chain 1 and turn 15 row 7 decrease in the first 2 sts double_crochet 11 decrease in the final 2 sts chain 1 and turn 13 row 8 decrease in the first 2 sts double_crochet 9 decrease in the final 2 sts chain 1 and turn 11 row 9 decrease in the first 2 sts double_crochet 7 decrease in the final 2 sts chain 1 and turn 9 row 10 start increasing 2 double_crochet in first st double_crochet 7 2 double_crochet in final stitch chain 1 and turn 11 row 11 2 double_crochet in first st double_crochet 9 2 double_crochet in final stitch chain 1 and turn 13 row 12 2 double_crochet in first st double_crochet 11 2 double_crochet in final stitch chain 1 and turn 15 row 13 2 double_crochet in first st double_crochet 13 2 double_crochet in final stitch chain 1 and turn 17 row 14 2 double_crochet in first st double_crochet 15 2 double_crochet in final stitch chain 1 and turn 19 row 15 2 double_crochet in first st double_crochet 17 2 double_crochet in final stitch chain 1 and turn 21 row 16 2 double_crochet in first st double_crochet 19 2 double_crochet in final stitch chain 1 and turn 23 row 17 2 double_crochet in first st double_crochet 21 2 double_crochet in final stitch 25 picture 7 picture 7 page 5 leg round 1 without cutting the yarn and without turning continue to crochet in the last round of the foot by crocheting a double_crochet into the first unworked double_crochet your marked st picture 8 double_crochet 24 then double_crochet 25 into row 17 of heel picture 8 picture 9 round 2 double_crochet in each st around 50 round 3-12 repeat round 2 50 picture 9 cuff without cutting the yarn chain 21 picture 10 double_crochet in the second st from hook and in the remaining 19 chs picture 10 picture 11 *slip_stitch in the next 2 st of round 12 of leg turn double_crochet 20 in the back loops of the cuff sts chain 1 turn double_crochet 20 in the back loops of previous row picture 11 repeat from * all around the leg finish at the top of cuff fasten_off and leave a long tail for sewing the gap together page 6 finishing off turn the sock inside out sew the holes of the heel together with your long tail sew the edges of the cuff together fasten_off secure and cut ends turn the sock with the right side out make another one well done you have finished your socks @pandagourgh #survivalsocks pandagourgh@hotmail com please follow me on instagram and use the hashtag to share your socks please don t hesitate to contact me on social media or by email if you need help with the pattern and i will try my best to assist you love elin stoodley/panda go urgh copyright elin stoodley/panda go urgh 2015 this is a free pattern so please share as you like but
